fields.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Unique attribute identifying a valid instance of a configurable compensation basis.
Inactive status indicator for the configurable compensation basis.
Unique name identifying a valid instance of a configurable compensation basis.
Description for the valid instance of configurable compensation basis.
Indicator to allow display of configurable compensation basis on the worker's related actions menu.
Ranking used if an employee is eligible for more than 1 compensation basis.

Eligibility Rules to establish who is eligible for this configurable compensation basis. If you select multiple eligibility rules, Workday evaluates each rule independently to determine employee eligibility for the compensation basis. Employees are eligible if they meet the qualifications of any one rule.

Functional area(s) for this configurable compensation basis. Benefits: 08f38eba0e48433a8fd1392dc9855d51, Compensation: e7f8e997756f419f80c963ee9c88dd0c, Planning: 9e48f14fb6a11000062945274d9430fb, or Projects and Work: b6e6f96990064b7995b0e84b01c9a0ba.

Description.description: Description for the valid instance of configurable compensation basis.

Eligibility_Rule_Reference.description: Eligibility Rules to establish who is eligible for this configurable compensation basis. If you select multiple eligibility rules, Workday evaluates each rule independently to determine employee eligibility for the compensation basis. Employees are eligible if they meet the qualifications of any one rule.
